member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.VideoIn
member.summary: Gets the receiver of participant video input with timestamps.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.AudioIn
member.summary: Gets the receiver of participant audio input with timestamps.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.EnableScreenSharing
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to enable screen sharing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.ScreenShareSize
member.remarks: See https://microsoftgraph.github.io/microsoft-graph-comms-samples/docs/bot_media/Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.VideoFormat.html for the list of video formats and sizes provided in Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.ScreenShareOut
member.summary: Gets the emitter that generates bot shared screen output.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.EnableVideoOutput
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to enable video output.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.VideoSize
member.remarks: See https://microsoftgraph.github.io/microsoft-graph-comms-samples/docs/bot_media/Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.VideoFormat.html for the list of video formats and sizes provided in Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.VideoOut
member.summary: Gets the emitter that generates bot video output.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.EnableAudioOutput
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to enable audio output.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.TeamsBot.ITeamsBot.AudioOut
member.summary: Gets the emitter that generates bot audio output.
